title: Design C: Gradient section blocks with minimal content
description:
Inspired by Megan Perkins and Matthew Blode. Clean horizontal gradient sections with simple, focused content in each block.

Key elements:
- Horizontal gradient sections/blocks
- Each section: one concept, minimal text
- Smooth transitions between sections
- Clean typography
- Could show: intro, skills, links, contact

References:
- https://meganperkins.com/
- https://matthewblode.com/

title: Design B: Asymmetric tilted layout with bold typography
description:
Inspired by Emily Lonetto's tilted, off-kilter design. Asymmetric sections that feel creative and human without being chaotic.

Key elements:
- Tilted/rotated sections or elements
- Bold, large typography as primary design element
- Asymmetric layout (not centered)
- Playful use of whitespace
- Gradient accents

References:
- https://www.emilylonetto.com/

title: Design A: Geometric gradient hero with logo focal point
description:
Inspired by Inga Hampton's design. Large gradient circle/blob as the hero element with the topher-logo.svg as a focal point. Clean, geometric, playful.

Key elements:
- Large gradient circle/blob (CSS gradients or SVG)
- Logo prominently featured
- Simple typography
- Minimal navigation
- Soft, colorful palette

References:
- https://ingahampton.com/
